Title: Neave Blacktalon
Legend: As swift as a lightning strike, Neave Blacktalon is utterly single-minded on the hunt. None are as adept at riding the winds aetheric as this pitiless assassin, who attacks before her prey ever sees her coming.
Intro: Neave Blacktalon is armed with a Boltstorm Pistol and the Whirlwind Axes.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Lightning-Fast Strikes
Rules.Fluff: When a Knight-Zephyros hunts their quarry, they unleash an ambush of powerful blows, cutting the foe down with ease.
Rules.Rule: Lightning-fast Strikes: Add D3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Whirlwind Axes if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.

Rules.Name: Tireless Hunter
Rules.Fluff: This determined warrior never stops moving in pursuit of their prey.
Rules.Rule: This unit can run and still shoot later in the turn.

Rules.Name: Windrider
Rules.Fluff: Neave Blacktalon requires no aid from Gryph-chargers to ride the winds aetheric.
Rules.Rule: Instead of picking this unit to make a normal move or retreat, you can say that it will ride the winds aetheric. If you do so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 1" from all terrain features and objectives and more than 9" from all enemy units.
